attributes.action: Force the BBC to stop John Motson commentating on live games.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Despite what the BBC may have you believe, John 'Motty' Motson is NOT a British institution.
The he is removed from television, sooner we, the British public, will be provided with more than sub-standard sports coverage.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
